name: Location Withheld Demake
description:
Location Withheld Demake is a PSX-styled demake of my previous game Location Withheld. It's a short horror experience focused on creating an immersive atmosphere in which you find yourself in an unfamiliar office surrounded by mysterious case files.

-------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

Look Around - Mouse

Interact - Left Click

Input Codes - Keyboard

-------------------------------------------------------------

Check out the original: https://bryce-bucher.itch.io/location-withheld

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/BryceBucher

-------------------------------------------------------------
